languages.text: "Чего нам не хватало, так это тайников. Надеюсь, ничего запретного в нем не было? Простите, Ваша Светлость, пустотники — народ простой. Сколько отучаю их от привычек крысиных, все никак. Им только дай что-нибудь в нору спрятать!"

"That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"
languages.original_text: "Чего нам не хватало, так это тайников. Надеюсь, ничего запретного в нем не было? Простите, Ваша Светлость, пустотники — народ простой. Сколько отучаю их от привычек крысиных, все никак. Им только дай что-нибудь в нору спрятать!"

I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

"That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

languages.text: «Justo lo que necesitábamos: más escondrijos secretos. No se habrán dejado nada olvidado ahí dentro, ¿verdad? Disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero los habitantes del vacío son gente sencilla. Llevo años intentando disuadirlos de sus costumbres vulgares. ¡Pero cuando le echan el guante a algo con un mínimo de valor, lo esconden en un hoyo como si fuesen ratas!».
languages.original_text: "That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

traits.locale_text: «Justo lo que necesitábamos: más escondrijos secretos. No se habrán dejado nada olvidado ahí dentro, ¿verdad? Disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero los habitantes del vacío son gente sencilla. Llevo años intentando disuadirlos de sus costumbres vulgares. ¡Pero cuando le echan el guante a algo con un mínimo de valor, lo esconden en un hoyo como si fuesen ratas!».

languages.text: 「もっと秘密の隠し場所があったなんて…何も禁じられたものはなかったでしょうね？申し訳ございません、陛下。ヴォイズマンは単純な民族です。私は何年もの間、彼らに不潔な習慣をやめさせようとしてきました。しかし、彼らに価値のあるものを与えても、ネズミのように穴に隠したがるだけです！」
languages.original_text: "That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

traits.locale_text: 「もっと秘密の隠し場所があったなんて…何も禁じられたものはなかったでしょうね？申し訳ございません、陛下。ヴォイズマンは単純な民族です。私は何年もの間、彼らに不潔な習慣をやめさせようとしてきました。しかし、彼らに価値のあるものを与えても、ネズミのように穴に隠したがるだけです！」

languages.text: “他们就是这样的人，总想把东西藏起来。藏匿处里应该没有什么违禁品吧？请原谅，大人，但这群泥腿子都是些头脑简单的家伙。这么多年来，我一直努力让他们改掉这个习惯，但根本没用。只要他们弄到了值钱的东西，就会像老鼠一样藏在洞里！”
languages.original_text: "That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

traits.locale_text: “他们就是这样的人，总想把东西藏起来。藏匿处里应该没有什么违禁品吧？请原谅，大人，但这群泥腿子都是些头脑简单的家伙。这么多年来，我一直努力让他们改掉这个习惯，但根本没用。只要他们弄到了值钱的东西，就会像老鼠一样藏在洞里！”

languages.text: "Das hat uns gerade noch gefehlt, noch mehr Geheimlager. Ich hoffe, es war nichts Verbotenes drin? "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber Raumfahrer sind einfache Leute. Ich versuche seit Jahren, ihnen ihre zwielichtigen Gewohnheiten auszutreiben. Aber sobald Ihr ihnen etwas von Wert gebt, wollen sie es nur noch wie eine Ratte in irgendeinem Loch verstecken!"
languages.original_text: "That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

traits.locale_text: "Das hat uns gerade noch gefehlt, noch mehr Geheimlager. Ich hoffe, es war nichts Verbotenes drin? "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber Raumfahrer sind einfache Leute. Ich versuche seit Jahren, ihnen ihre zwielichtigen Gewohnheiten auszutreiben. Aber sobald Ihr ihnen etwas von Wert gebt, wollen sie es nur noch wie eine Ratte in irgendeinem Loch verstecken!"

languages.text: « Encore des caches secrètes… On avait bien besoin de ça, tiens. J'espère qu'elles ne contenaient rien d'illégal. Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais les cosmomarins sont des gens simples. Ça fait des années que j'essaie de les débarrasser de leurs sales habitudes, mais dès qu'on leur donne quelque chose qui a un tant soit peu de valeur, ils ne peuvent pas s'empêcher d'aller cacher le tout au fin fond d'un trou ! »
languages.original_text: "That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"

traits.locale_text: « Encore des caches secrètes… On avait bien besoin de ça, tiens. J'espère qu'elles ne contenaient rien d'illégal. Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais les cosmomarins sont des gens simples. Ça fait des années que j'essaie de les débarrasser de leurs sales habitudes, mais dès qu'on leur donne quelque chose qui a un tant soit peu de valeur, ils ne peuvent pas s'empêcher d'aller cacher le tout au fin fond d'un trou ! »

languages.text: "Gizli birkaç zula daha mı? Bir bu eksikti. Umuyorum içinde yasaklı hiçbir şey bulmamışsınızdır. Kusuruma bakmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama uçsuz erleri öyle pek yol yordam bilmez. Yıllardır onları rezil alışkanlıklarından vazgeçirmeye çalışıyorum. Ellerine kıymetli bir şey verin, tek isteyecekleri onu sıçan gibi deliğin tekine saklamak olacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "That's just what we need, more secret stashes. I hope there was nothing forbidden in it? Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but voidsmen are simple folk. I've been trying to wean them off their grubby habits for years. But give them anything worth having and all they want to do is hide it in a hole like a rat!"
